example.parse: (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يعني) (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS ذلك)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC رجال) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدين))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP كانوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قبل) (NP (DEM_PRON_MS ذلك))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC بعيدين) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السياسة)) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شؤون) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السلطة)))))))))
